title: Skin Therapist Interview
Interview Descriptions: Hands-on practical with shop educator. The first half is basic interview questions that estheticians should expect when applying for a job. Expect questions like tell us about you skincare background.
Interview Questions: Wat makes you a great fit?

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Heyday (Berkeley, CA) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: Very easy-going, rather informal, not too intimidating. I enjoyed my interview here. It was with two hiring managers, and we sat around a table and chatted. I would say being proactive here is a big plus.
Interview Questions: What are your long-term career goals?
